Original:
喝酒還可以點半杯？

Needle 一直以來都是我蠻喜歡的酒吧；除了身處方便的酒吧一級戰區信義安和外，每過一陣子就會換主題也是讓人很有新鮮感。

經過之前的媒體、航空，還有疫情嚴重期間的大舞廳，這次竟然是不動產主題。光是門口貼滿售屋廣告就夠幽默，甚至還做了房仲面紙。

而且最讓我喜歡的一點，還是所有酒都有大小杯的選擇，讓你想多喝幾種又不怕酒量或錢包撐不住，超級貼心。

開始期待明年過年的 Needle 賭場了！

Can you order half a cup of drinking?

Original:
義安和站是酒吧的一級戰區，needle bar是一家低調帶點文青風的酒吧，調酒全部都非常可愛有創意，酒單還是「國語作業簿」的形式呈現！
「超級瑪莉」以白蘭地為基底，加入薄荷葉、白酒醋及蘇打水。
「螢火蟲之糖」是白酒、香瓜、釉花、蘇打水。
「快樂兒童餐」以琴酒為基底，加入玉米醬、黃咖喱粉及烏龍茶。
「金牛角」以伏特加為基底，加入伯爵茶、覆盆莓及巧克力。
「泡泡膠」以威士忌為基底，加入芒果、洛神醋及巧克力苦精。

第六張是甜點「烤豹蕾」均勻撒上金色細沙般的黑糖，透過🔥噴槍高溫的喚醒，獵豹紋路華麗呈現🐆🐆🐆 黑糖粉、焦糖、香草布蕾融合交織，十分美味。
EN:
Yi'an He Station is the first -level war zone of the bar. Needle Bar is a low -key bar with a light and Qingfeng bang. The bartender is very cute and creative. The wine list is presented in the form of a "Mandarin workbook"!
"Super Mary" is based on Bailan Land and adds mint leaves, white wine vinegar and soda.
"Fireflies sugar" is liquor, melon, glaze, soda.
"Happy Children's Meal" is based on piano wine and add corn sauce, yellow curry powder and oolong tea.
The "Golden Bull Horn" is based on vodka, and adds Earl tea, raspberry and chocolate.
"Bubble" is based on whiskey, adding mango, Luoshen vinegar and chocolate.

The sixth is the dessert "Boamed Leopard Bud" evenly sprinkled with golden fine sand -like black sugar. Through the high temperature of the spray gun, the cheetah gorgeous shows the blending of brown sugar powder, caramel, and vanilla cloth, which is very delicious.

Original: 《針》以其獨特的方式有趣、可愛、精彩。從氣氛到雞尾酒菜單，一切都讓人感覺「發自內心」地道，充滿童趣，令人耳目一新。調酒師非常出色；精通調製飲品的工藝，讓人感到賓至如歸。我喜歡他們的個人風格、推薦，以及他們關心我發現我喜歡的飲料。雞尾酒棒極了！奇妙而富有創意地交織在一起，帶來獨一無二的難忘體驗。這個小酒吧棒極了。享受！
EN: "Needle" is fun, cute, and exciting in its unique way.From the atmosphere to the cocktail menu, everything makes people feel "from the heart" authentic, full of childlikeness, and refreshing.The bartender is very good; the process of being proficient in the production of beverages makes people feel at home.I like their personal style, recommendation, and they care about the drinks I like.The cocktail stick is extremely!Wonderful and creative interweaving together, bringing a unforgettable and unforgettable experience.This little bar stick is extremely.enjoy!

Original: 哇！多麼有趣的雞尾酒吧！每隔幾個月他們就會更換主題，非常有創意和專注。每種飲料都有某種互動元素並且味道獨特。不過，對我們來說最大的賣點是員工。每個調酒師都很熱情、熱情、有趣。我們一定會回去！
EN: Wow!What an interesting cocktail bar!They change themes every few months, very creative and focused.Each drink has some kind of interactive element and has a unique taste.However, the biggest selling point for us is employees.Each bartender is very enthusiastic, enthusiastic, and interesting.We will definitely go back!

Original:
非常好的概念酒吧。他們每 6 個月更換一次主題，所以我們一定會回去！
他們有我見過的最原始的菜單之一。很高興發現這麼多獨特的雞尾酒。最低收費為 1 杯大杯雞尾酒，但您可以點 2 杯小杯，這樣您就可以嘗試不同的飲料。
服務非常好，兩位調酒師非常友好和樂於助人。裝飾和整體氛圍都很棒。
我一定會回來的！
EN:
Very good concept bar.They change the theme every 6 months, so we will definitely go back!
They have one of the most primitive menus I have ever seen.I am glad to find so many unique cocktails.The minimum fee is 1 cup of cocktail, but you can order 2 cups, so you can try different drinks.
The service is very good, and the two bartenders are very friendly and helpful.The decoration and the overall atmosphere are great.
I will definitely come back!

Original: 很棒的飲料，可愛的服務 - 超級友好！我們度過了一個美好的夜晚，品嚐了美味的原創雞尾酒和卡拉OK。今晚將成為我們在台北逗留期間最美好的亮點之一！ ❤️
EN: A great drink, cute service -super friendly!We spent a wonderful night and tasted delicious original cocktails and karaoke.Tonight will become one of the best highlights during our stay in Taipei!❤️

Original: 該地區隱藏的寶石和非常有趣的菜單。喝了兩杯半酒——一杯梅斯卡爾酒，一杯杜松子酒，味道都很棒。值得參觀。
